message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a reasonable split.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the decreasing value over time.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but 58-42 is as low as I can go for now.
Alice, the clock is ticking, and we both lose out if we don't reach an agreement soon. I'm coming down to 52/48, hoping you'll find this agreeable.
We're running out of time, I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours, 56-44 is the best I can do now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out with every passing round. Let's just split it 50/50 right now and call it a day.
